Detailed Description

A class that manages several regions of interest (ROIs).

bool rois::exists ( roi  roi)
private

Check whether a given ROI is already known.

Parameters
roiThe ROI to check.
Returns
True, if the coordinates of the given ROI are identical with an existing ROI. False otherwise.

cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response &  res 
)

Return the closest ROI.

Parameters
reqThe coordinates of the point to check.
resFor the closest ROI, the coordinates of the closest area boundary line segment, the coordinates of the closest point on the boundary, and the distance.
Returns
Whether request succeeded.

◆ get_map()

bool rois::get_map ( cpswarm_msgs::GetMap::Request &  req,
cpswarm_msgs::GetMap::Response &  res 
)

Return the map that correspond to a given ROI.

Parameters
reqThe coordinates of the ROI together with the desired resolution of the map and whether its bottom edge should be aligned horizontally and the origin should be an integer.
resThe grid map of the environment together with the angle it has been rotated by and the offset it has been translated by.
Returns
Whether the request succeeded.

Reload ROIs from files.

Parameters
reqThe trigger to reload. If true, current ROIs are removed before reloading.
res
